post.summary: V2 - Get the managers for a list of employees
post.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of managers’ UniqueIDs on a given date based on an input list of employees’ UniqueIDs. The calculation of the manager will be done from the employee’s Primary Situation taking in consideration the next factors: the current LineManager, the Organisation Manager and/or the Position Manager.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

requestBody.description: The DTO containing the query parameters

get.description:
This endpoint lists all the documents attached to every employee in CoreHR. The list is ordered by modification date from the lowest to the highest.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Format - int32. Specifies the offset of the first row to return. Defaults to 0

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Format - int32. Specifies the number of rows to retrieve (used with offset). Defaults to 1000. Min 500, Max 10000

parameters.name: minimumModificationDate
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Filters the result list to recover only the documents where modificationDate is bigger or equal to this parameter.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filters the list by returning only documents that have the same type

parameters.name: organisationalStructure
parameters.description: Expects a Organisational Structure Client Code. Filters the list by returning only documents for employees attached to this Organisational Structure in their current Primary Situation. Supports Position Management. Always considers the current date.

get.description:
This endpoint helps you get the binary content of a document based on its documentId.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: Format - int64. The Document Identifier

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of document changes starting from an initial date up to Now. These ‘document’ objects will describe the state of the change as Created, Deleted or Modified. If filtered by organisationalStrucutre, the statues will include two new states: MovedIn or MovedAway.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: lastSyncDateTime
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). The UTC date-time representing the exact moment the last synchronisation took place as this date will be used to start a new changes calculation. Defaults to 1753-01-01 00:00:00.000

parameters.name: organisationalStructure
parameters.description: Expects a Organisational Structure Client Code. Filters the list by returning only documents for employees attached to this Organisational Structure in their current Primary Situation. Supports Position Management. Always considers the current date.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Format - int32. Specifies the offset of the first row to return. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Format - int32. Specifies the number of rows to retrieve (used with offset). Defaults to 1000. Min 500, Max 10000.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of logs representing modifications done on the HUB Libraries (ordered by ascending LogID). These modifications are logged field by field. The return object describes these modifications despite the source library type or field.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: startingFromLogId
parameters.description: Format - int64. The first LogID to retrieve. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: maxNumberOfLogs
parameters.description: Format - int32. The maximum number of logs to retrieve per response. Default is 1000 logs.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all the library records of the selected Library Type at a particular date. If the date is not given, then all the records will be retrieved.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: libraryType
parameters.description: The type of library

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Date at which the library records shall be retrieved

get.summary: Get a list of all the library types
get.description:
This endpoint will list all available library types.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

get.summary: Get a list of fields for a library type
get.description:
This endpoint will list all fields (properties) for the provided list type.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: libraryType
parameters.description: the type of library

get.summary: V2 - Get libraries current state logs
get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of logs representing modifications done on the HUB libraries nodes (ordered by ascending LogID). These modifications are logged node by node. The return object describes these modifications despite the source library.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: startingFromLogId
parameters.description: Format - int64. The first LogID to retrieve.

parameters.name: maxNumberOfLogs
parameters.description: Format - int32. The maximum number of logs to retrieve per response.

parameters.name: libraries
parameters.description: Filters the logs to retrieve only those corresponding to the libraries technical names set into this list.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of logs representing modifications done on the HUB positions. These modifications are logged field by field. The return object describes these modifications.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: startingFromLogId
parameters.description: Format - int64. The first LogID to retrieve. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: maxNumberOfLogs
parameters.description: Format - int32. The maximum number of logs to retrieve per response. Default is 1000 logs.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all the position node records at a particular date. If the date is not given, then all the records for dates will be retrieved.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Date at which the library records shall be retrieved

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all the position node records for a given client code at a particular date. If the date is not given, then all the records for dates will be retrieved.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: clientCode
parameters.description: The client code for which the library records shall be retrieved

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Date at which the library records shall be retrieved

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all the positions structure node records for a given client code at a particular date. If the date is not given, then all the records for dates will be retrieved.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|

parameters.name: clientCode
parameters.description: The client code for which the library records shall be retrieved

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Date at which the library records shall be retrieved

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all the position node records at a particular date. If the date is not given, then all the records for dates will be retrieved.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Date at which the library records shall be retrieved

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of logs representing modifications done on the HUB positions structure. These modifications are logged relationship by relationship. The return object describes these modifications.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: startingFromLogId
parameters.description: Format - int64. The first LogID to retrieve. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: maxNumberOfLogs
parameters.description: Format - int32. The maximum number of logs to retrieve per response. Default is 1000 logs.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves the information representing an employee attached to a position (identified by the positionClientCode) at a particular date. If the date is not given, then all the assignments for any date will be retrieved.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: positionClientCode
parameters.description: The position client code

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Date at which the position assignments shall be retrieved

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of logs representing modifications done on the HUB Employee Files (ordered by ascending LogID). These modifications are logged field by field. The return object describes these modifications despite the source data set or the field

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: startingFromLogId
parameters.description: Format - int64. The first LogID to retrieve. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: maxNumberOfLogs
parameters.description: Format - int32. The maximum number of logs to retrieve per response. Default is 1000 logs.

parameters.name: datasets
parameters.description: The datasets parameters to be filtered. If not supplied then all logs in interval will be retrieved.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all the fields of all the data sets for the given employee at a particular date. If the date is not given, then all the records for all the data sets will be retrieved.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: uniqueId
parameters.description: The employee unique identifier

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Date at which the data set records shall be retrieved.

parameters.name: datasets
parameters.description:
Comma separated list of existing data sets.
If the parameter is sent with no value, no filter is applied.
If the parameter is sent with a duplicated dataset, the filter is ok, and applied once per identified dataset, all duplicated datasets are simply ignored.
If the parameter is sent with an unidentified dataset name, the unidentified dataset doesn’t not affect the filter, it is simply ignored.

parameters.name: includeClosestRecords
parameters.description: Determines if fields coming from records that are 'closest' (either in the past or future) shall be included in the response when such timelines have no matching record defined by the date parameter.

get.summary: V2 - Get one dataset for an employee
get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all the fields of the selected data set for the given employee at a particular date. If the date is not given, then all the records for the selected data set will be retrieved.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: uniqueId
parameters.description: The employee unique identifier

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: The name of the data set

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the data set. It needs to be in the format format {{key}} or {{key}}{{subkey}}

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Date at which the data set records shall be retrieved.

parameters.name: includeClosestRecords
parameters.description: Determines if fields coming from records that are 'closest' (either in the past or future) shall be included in the response when such timelines have no matching record defined by the date parameter.

get.summary: V2 - Get the current state employees logs
get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of logs representing modifications done on the HUB Employee Files (ordered by ascending LogID). These modifications are logged data set by data set. The return object describes these modifications despite the source data set.

| ADM_API_EXTRACTION_API_ACCESS | Access to the administrative management's Hub extraction API, with no restrictions and bypassing other rights |

parameters.name: startingFromLogId
parameters.description: Format - int64. The first LogID to retrieve.

parameters.name: maxNumberOfLogs
parameters.description: Format - int32. The maximum number of logs to retrieve per response.

parameters.name: datasets
parameters.description: The datasets parameters to be filtered. If not supplied then all logs in interval will be retrieved.

patch.description:
This endpoint updates one employee, on one or many datasets, and one or many records of the same dataset.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_COREHR_API_INBOUND_UPDATE_EMPLOYEE | [API] Update an employee |

get.description:
BETA. Gets an employee file for a given uniqueid. Only the datasets enabled for the user will be sent. This is a Beta version so it includes only a shortlist of datasets.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_COREHR_OUTBOUND_API_BETA_GET_EMPLOYEE | [API] [BETA] Retrieve a Core HR employee file |

200.description: The response is composed of an array of datasets, for each dataset we have an array of records and for each records the list of all the fields that are not null.

post.description:
This endpoint creates an employee in the Core HR. If the UniqueID is not sent, it will be generated automatically based on the customer configuration.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_EMPLOYEE_CREATION | [API] Create an employee |

This endpoint allows you to create and add documents to employees in Core HR. You can specify the document type and define the properties of the document. Please note that each API request transmits a single document.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| CREATE_DOCUMENTS_API | [API] Create documents in Core HR |

post.description:
This endpoint allows to terminate an employee contract. If this contract is the last active one for the concerned employee, then all the employee file will be terminated.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_CONTRACT_TERMINATE | [API] Terminate a contract |

post.summary: V3 - Create a contract for an employee
post.description:
This endpoint allows to create an employee contract. If the Contract Number is not sent, the system will automatically generate a contract number based on the customer configuration.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_COREHR_API_INBOUND_UPDATE_EMPLOYEE | [API] Update an employee |

get.description:
This GET endpoint retrieves all the pending onboardees list with all their properties. The list can be filtered with a maximum of effective date

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_COREHR_API_INBOUND_GET_ONBOARDEE | [API] Retrieve “onboarding in progress” profiles |

parameters.name: maxEffectiveDate
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). If not NULL, filter on JoinDate smaller or equal than this parameter.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Number of items to return
(Maximum value is 100, default value is 20)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description:
Index of the first element to return
(Starts from 0. For example 40 means starting with the 41th row)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Should return the metadata, including the items total count
(The value should be "metadata")

200.description: List of pending onboardees filtered by supplied parameters

post.description:
This endpoint creates a draft of an employee (onboardee) in the Core HR. A temporary id will be generated and sent back to the user. This id should be saved if the user wants to update the onboardee in later operations.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_COREHR_API_INBOUND_CREATE_ONBOARDEES | [API] Create an “onboarding in progress” profile |

get.description:
This endpoint gets an existing draft file (onboardee) from the Core HR. The onboardee is identified using his OnboardeeID.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_COREHR_API_INBOUND_GET_ONBOARDEE | [API] Retrieve “onboarding in progress” profiles |

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Format - int64.

patch.description:
This endpoint updates an existing draft (onboardee) in the Core HR. The onboardee is identified using his temporary.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_COREHR_API_INBOUND_UPDATE_ONBOARDEE | [API] Update the “onboarding in progress” profiles |

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Format - int64.

get.summary: V3 - Get change logs by employee [BETA]
get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of logs representing modifications done on one employee file ordered in a chronological order.
These modifications are logged field by field. The return object describes these modifications.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_API_GET_EMPLOYEE_LOGS | [API] Get the employee modification logs |

parameters.name: uniqueId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the employee

parameters.name: modifiedDateFrom
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). The minimum ModificationDateTime of the logs to be returned.

parameters.name: modifiedDateTo
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). The maximum ModificationDateTime of the logs to be returned.

parameters.name: datasets
parameters.description: Comma separated list of the datasets of the logs to be returned.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Format - int32. Maximum number of logs to be returned. Send 0 to disable pagination and return all logs.

delete.description:
This endpoint allows you to delete a document from Core HR using its Document id.

| Required permission | Description |
|---------------------|-------------|
| ADM_COREHR_DELETE_DOCUMENTS_API | [API] Delete documents in Core HR |

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: Format - int64.

UniqueId.description: Gets or sets the UniqueID of the employee owner of this file

DocumentId.description: Gets or sets the File Identifier

Type.description: Gets or sets the File type(normally corresponds to the data set)

SubType.description: Gets or sets the File sub type  (normally corresponds to the data set cluster key if the document has been attached to a record, in that case the Key format applies such as {{key}} )

Size.description: Gets or sets the file size in bytes

ModificationDateTime.description: Gets or sets the file modification date time

Extension.description: Gets or sets the file extension

FileName.description: Gets or sets the file name

UniqueId.description: Gets or sets the employee UniqueId.

Type.description: Gets or sets the document type (normally corresponds to the data set).

SubType.description: Gets or sets the document subtype (normally corresponds to the data set cluter key if the document has been attached to a record, in that case the Key format applies such as { { key } } ).

ModificationDateTime.description: Gets or sets the document modification date time.

State.description: Gets or sets the document state (Created, Modified, Deleted, MovedIn, MovedAway).

Value.description: Gets or sets the enumeration underlying value

Label.description: Gets or sets the label to display for the value.

Option.description: The option view model. Represents a enum value.

Currency.description:
ISO 4217 currencies code list
The string enum representation is the 4217_alphacode
The Int enum representation is the 4217_numericcode
See http://www.iso.org/iso/fr/support/faqs/faqs_widely_used_standards/widely_used_standards_other/currency_codes/currency_codes_list-1.htm
            

| Possible Values | Documentation |
|-----------------|---------------|
|AFA| Afghan afghani (historical currency)|
|ALL| Lek (ALBANIA)|
|DZD| Algerian Dinar (ALGERIA)|
|ADP| Andorran peseta (1:1 peg to the Spanish peseta) (historical currency)|
|AON| Angolan new kwanza (historical currency)|
|AZM| Azerbaijani manat (historical currency)|
|ARS| Argentine Peso (ARGENTINA)|
|AUD| Australian Dollar (AUSTRALIA)|
|ATS| Austrian schilling (historical currency)|
|BSD| Bahamian Dollar (BAHAMAS)|
|BHD| Bahraini Dinar (BAHRAIN)|
|BDT| Taka (BANGLADESH)|
|AMD| Armenian Dram (ARMENIA)|
|BBD| Barbados Dollar (BARBADOS)|
|BEF| Belgian franc (currency union with LUF) (historical currency)|
|BMD| Bermudian Dollar (BERMUDA)|
|BTN| Ngultrum  (BHUTAN)|
|BOB| Boliviano (BOLIVIA, PLURINATIONAL STATE OF)|
|BWP| Pula (BOTSWANA)|
|BZD| Belize Dollar (BELIZE)|
|SBD| Solomon Islands Dollar (SOLOMON ISLANDS)|
|BND| Brunei Dollar (BRUNEI DARUSSALAM)|
|BGL| Bulgarian lev A/99 (historical currency)|
|MMK| Kyat (MYANMAR)|
|BIF| Burundi Franc (BURUNDI)|
|KHR| Riel (CAMBODIA)|
|CAD| Canadian Dollar (CANADA)|
|CVE| Cape Verde Escudo (CAPE VERDE)|
|KYD| Cayman Islands Dollar (CAYMAN ISLANDS)|
|LKR| Sri Lanka Rupee (SRI LANKA)|
|CLP| Chilean Peso (CHILE)|
|CNY| Yuan Renminbi (CHINA)|
|COP| Colombian Peso (COLOMBIA)|
|KMF| Comoro Franc (COMOROS)|
|ZRN| Zaïrean new zaïre (historical currency)|
|CRC| Costa Rican Colon (COSTA RICA)|
|HRK| Croatian Kuna (CROATIA)|
|CUP| Cuban Peso (CUBA)|
|CYP| Cypriot pound (historical currency)|
|CSK| Czechoslovak koruna (historical currency)|
|CZK| Czech Koruna (CZECH REPUBLIC)|
|DKK| Danish Krone (DENMARK)|
|DOP| Dominican Peso (DOMINICAN REPUBLIC)|
|ECS| Ecuadorian sucre (historical currency)|
|SVC| Salvadoran colón (historical currency)|
|ETB| Ethiopian Birr (ETHIOPIA)|
|ERN| Nakfa (ERITREA)|
|EEK| Estonian kroon (historical currency)|
|FKP| Falkland Islands Pound (FALKLAND ISLANDS (MALVINAS))|
|FJD| Fiji Dollar (FIJI)|
|FIM| Finnish markka (historical currency)|
|FRF| French franc (historical currency)|
|DJF| Djibouti Franc (DJIBOUTI)|
|GMD| Dalasi (GAMBIA)|
|DEM| German mark (historical currency)|
|DDM| East German Mark of the GDR (East Germany) (historical currency)|
|GHC| Ghanaian cedi (historical currency)|
|GIP| Gibraltar Pound (GIBRALTAR)|
|GRD| Greek drachma (historical currency)|
|GTQ| Quetzal (GUATEMALA)|
|GNF| Guinea Franc (GUINEA)|
|GYD| Guyana Dollar (GUYANA)|

AbilityTypes.description:
Possible values for the fitness to work on a template

| Possible Values | Documentation |
|-----------------|---------------|
|Y| Yes.|
|N| No.|
|U| Unknown.|
|T| Temporary.|

PaymentMethod.description:
Possible values for the payment method of the bank information thematic set

| Possible Values | Documentation |
|-----------------|---------------|
|BankTransfer| Bank transfer|
|Cheque| Cheque|
|Cash| |

CountryCode.description:
ISO 3166 country codes list.
The string enum representation is the 3166-1_alpha-3 code
The int enum representation is the 3166-1_numeric code
see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3 for the list of 3166-1_alpha-3 codes
see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_numeric for the list of 3166-1_numeric codes

Gender.description:
Possible values for the gender of an individual

| Possible Values | Documentation |
|-----------------|---------------|
|M| The male.|
|F| The female.|
|N| The neutral.|
|U| The unknown.|

Citizenship.description:
Nationality list (initially based on ISO 3166 country codes list).
The string enum representation is the 3166-1_alpha-3 code
The int enum representation is the 3166-1_numeric code
see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3 for the list of 3166-1_alpha-3 codes
see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_numeric for the list of 3166-1_numeric codes

DayOfWeekOff.description:
Define all day of week using bit flags

| Possible Values | Documentation |
|-----------------|---------------|
|None| No day off|
|Sunday| The sunday.|
|Monday| The monday.|
|Tuesday| The tuesday.|
|Wednesday| The wednesday.|
|Thursday| The thursday.|
|Friday| The friday.|
|Saturday| The saturday.|
|AllDayOfWeek| All day of week|

Quality.description:
| Possible Values | Documentation |
|-----------------|---------------|
|Primary| The male.|
|Deputy| The female.|
|Other| The female.|

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the extra value. Mandatory for a new code. Ignored for an existing code.

ShortName.description: Gets or sets Localized ShortName for the node

FullName.description: Gets or sets Localized FullName for the node
